name: Mirror Valley
description:
You are a witch's apprentice and although you are still weak, the pieces of the magic mirror you have will help you get through.

Press 1,2,3 to switch between the different skills, which are released by the pieces of the mirror.

Skill 1 creates a mirror that rotates 45, 90 and 135 degrees in front of you (use the left mouse button to rotate it), the mirror creates a symmetrical phantom, press E to change your position with the phantom. (The shadow is fragile and will disappear when it hits a wall)

After using skill 2 you also need to click on any two points with the mouse, the line formed by these two points will form a mirror, creating a powerful shadow. Pressing the left or E button allows the shadow to attack, which is the protagonist's only means of self-defence.

When skill 3 is used, if the protagonist touches the mirror it will shrink and can reach some narrow places. It will change back after switching skills.

WASD to move, space to jump, some places can be dropped by holding down the s key.
